summary: ESC SYSTEM IS NOT WORKING PROPERLY.  POWER STEERING WARNING COMES ON AT RANDOM TIMES AND IT BECOMES VERY DIFFICULT TO STEER. ONCE I GET PULLED OVER AND SHUT THE CAR OFF AND BACK ON IT RETURNS TO NORMAL.  I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY WHEN IT STARTED.  IT HAPPENED A COUPLE TIMES LAST YEAR AND THEN AGAIN YESTERDAY.
